mapper.insert: insert into t_main_blog (blogid, title, createtime, lastupdatetime, content, autorid) values (#{blogId}, #{title}, sysdate(), #{lastUpdateTime}, #{content}, #{autorid})
mapper.select: SELECT t.blogid,t.createtime,t.lastupdatetime,t.title, t.content,t.autorid,t.autorid autorname,t.readcount,t.upupcount FROM t_main_blog AS t ORDER BY t.createtime DESC
SELECT t1.userid,t2.nickname,t1.saysome,t1.url,t1.blogcount,t1.commentcount FROM t_main_userurl t1,t_main_userinfo t2 WHERE t1.userid = t2.userid AND t1.url=#{url}
